message.content:
I need to identify the total income (revenue) and its constituent components from the given income statement.

Looking at the income statement:
- The line "Total Revenue" shows 5813420.67
- This appears to consist of a single component: "Main Business Revenue" with the same value (5813420.67)

This matches what we need - the total income arising from ordinary activities, and its component sub-item.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '5813420.67', 'sub_items': {'Main Business Revenue': '5813420.67'}} }
```
